::Grimmler/Fliq::

Grimmler exits the CR chamber, looking around at the room. He sighs, 
walking off toward the power core of the Cybertronian Fire to check on 
it.
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
Fliq walks out of his room, his eyes still wet from mourning his dead 
commander Brix. The mourning had helped him a bit, but now he felt as 
if something else was gone, something important.

Sighing in sadness, Fliq walks off toward the bridge in search of 
something t
